title: Artificial Intelligence goes rogue
description: Crime no longer announces itself with violence, it arrives through algorithms

title: California state senator seeks moratorium on AI toys for kids' safety
description: San Diego State Senator Steve Padilla has proposed a four-year moratorium on the sale and manufacturing of AI chatbots for children under 18, citing concerns about child safety and inappropriate conversations.

title: Let Tesda lead Philippines in AI adoption — Salceda
description: MANILA, Philippines — It’s the Technical Education and Skills Development Authority (Tesda) that, more than any other government agency, should take the lead in preparing the Philippines for the impact of artificial intelligence (AI) on jobs, according to a new policy paper. title: Top Artificial Intelligence Stocks To Watch Today – January 3rd
description: Tempus AI, Hut 8, and BigBear.ai are the three Artificial Intelligence stocks to watch today, according to MarketBeat’s stock screener tool. title: CES gadget fest a world stage for AI and its hype
description: Dreams about the vast potential of artificial intelligence will collide with cold, hard reality as the Consumer Electronics Show kicks off in Las Vegas on Tuesday.
